turkish_example_sentence: Siz bize açık açıkça cevap vermezseniz, şüphe duyacağız.
english_example_sentence: If you don't give us a clear answer, we will doubt.
russian_example_sentence: Если вы не дадите нам четкий ответ, мы будем сомневаться.
